item.description:
A tradition three years in the making, we will be hosting a birthday bar crawl Sept 12 (Eric's "actual" birthdate is Sept 14; Devorah's is Oct 1). Drinks will be accepted in lieu of gifts.

Come out and celebrate with us starting at 8pm, and going until the bars close or until we are too ____ to walk! (fill in the blank!)

If anyone knows the management/owners of any downtown New Haven clubs/pubs/restaurants (and we could use you as a contact), please let me know so that we can fine-tune the route! Sullivan's and Rudy's are steps from my place (and Rudy's has Frites), so they would be great end-of-night stops!

Prime 16, 8-9:30p (If enough people show up around 8: 2 or 3 beers 1/2 half price @ $2.50!)
Richter's, 9:30-10p (for a shot)
Geronimo, 10-11:30p ($5 margaritas and $3 beers w/wristbands, thanks Selam!)
GPSCY 11:30p-?

Eric's number is in his RSVP's; so is Dev's. A designee might step up as contact towards the event date, because I'm sure the shots will be flowing! :) I hope to see YOU there!
item.how_to_find_us: Start Singing Happy Birthday (or a variant)
item.name: Eric's birthday! Devorah's birthday! Eric's friend Greg's birthday!
